EXPORT_SPEC void ixmlNode_free

(IXML_Node* IXML_Node )

Frees a Node and all Nodes in its subtree.

Documentation

Frees a Node and all Nodes in its subtree.

Parameters:
IXML_Node - The Node to free.
Returns:
[void] This function does not return a value.
